order-size.title: Ord待er size
order-size.body1: Sets待 the size of your order.
order-size.body2: Y待our maximal order size, based on your open positions and the state of the exchange, is:
order-size.body3: Th待e minimal position size for this perpetual is:

limit-price.title: Lim待it price
limit-price.body1: If待 you specify a limit price your order will be executed at the predetermined limit price or a better price.
limit-price.body2: Fo待r a stop order, setting a limit price is optional. A stop order with specified limit price is a stop-limit order, a stop order without specified limit price is a stop-market order.

trigger-price.title: Tr待igger price
trigger-price.body1: Th待e trigger price is the mark price at which your stop order is triggered.
trigger-price.body2: If待 you do not select a limit price in addition to your trigger price, you would be placing a stop-market order. Your order will be executed at the best available price once triggered.
trigger-price.body3: If 待you specify a limit price in addition to your trigger price, you would be placing a stop-limit order. Your order will be executed at the predetermined limit price or a better price.

leverage.title: Levera待ge
leverage.body1: Speci待fies the leverage of your order.
leverage.body2: If 待your order is reducing an existing position ('partial closure'), the leverage you select has no impact.

expiry.title: Exp待iry settings
expiry.body: Set the待 number of days after, which your main order will expire (this setting does not affect your take-profit and stop-loss orders).

stop-loss.title: S待top loss
stop-loss.body1: Yo待u can specify a stop loss order to go along with your main order.
stop-loss.body2: If待 you select e.g. -50%, you create a second order, that will be triggered if your loss on your main order reaches -50%.
stop-loss.body3: Te待chnically, you are specifying a stop-market order, of the opposing side (if your main order is a BUY order, you are specifying a stop-market SELL order). The trigger price is automatically calculated such that your overall loss is as per your selection, assuming you entered at the worst price your slippage settings allow.

take-profit.title: Take待 profit
take-profit.body1: You 待can specify a take profit order to go along with your main order.
take-profit.body2: If yo待u select e.g., 100%, you create a second order, that will be triggered if your profit on your main order reaches 100%.
take-profit.body3: Techni待cally, you are specifying a limit order of the opposing side (if your main order is a BUY order, you are specifying a limit SELL order). The limit price is automatically calculated such that your overall profit is as per your selection, assuming you entered at the worst price your slippage settings allow.
